account_creation_request_success.message: your account creation request has been registered.

account_creation_request_description.message: You will receive a confirmation email, click the link provides therein to complete the creation of your account.

account_creation_description.message: you can now log in with your e-mail address and your password.

account_creation_log_in.message: follow this link to access the login form.

error_password_exceeds_max_characters.message: password exceeds the maximum number of characters allowed (50).

error_password_not_match_confirm_passwor.message: password and confirmation do not match.

error_user_already_exist.message: email $EMAIL$ is already in our user database, if you have forgotten your password, use the password change form.

error_request_already_done.message: an account creation request for e-mail $EMAIL$ is already in progress.

error_request_expired.message: the account creation request has expired.

error_login_password_not_match.message: Username and password do not match.
